content: उपनिधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To put or place near; to bring or lead near to; कर्णयोरुपनिधाय (मुखं) <ls>Āśval.</ls>; वहति समीरे मदनमुपनिधाय <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To produce, cause; <ls>Bk. 4. 45.</ls> {@--3@} To present; <ls>Māl. 5. 25.</ls> {@--4@} To deposit, entrust; <ls>Ms. 8. 37</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">196.</ls>
